content: back in nyc, the vibe is unreal 🌃 just strolled through times square and it's like i never left. time to grind again, especially after that job situation 😅
raw_content: Back in NYC! The city's energy is electrifying. Just walked past Times Square, and it feels like I never left. Time to dive back into the hustle, especially after losing my job.

content: so it's my 22nd bday today 🎉 and instead of party planning, i've been reflecting on what's next. pretty set on breaking into a quant trading firm, just sent out apps to three top ones. wish me luck! 🙏
raw_content: Today's my 22nd birthday, and I've spent it reflecting on what I want next. My focus is now on securing a role in a quant trading firm. Sent out applications to three top firms.

content: Caught up with an old mentor over coffee today ☕ talked about my career and got some killer advice on tweaking my resume for quant trading gigs.
